hero.subtitle: The only platform that bridges your internal management with your public presence. Control your leads and properties while captivating your clients.

features.sectionSubtitle: The platform that transforms your real estate business
features.description: Inmobo is a complete real estate CRM that centralizes all your business operations: from property publishing to closing sales, including lead management, bookings, and payments.

feature1.title: Property Management
feature1.desc: Register, edit, and organize all your properties in one place with images, amenities, and custom details.

feature2.title: Lead CRM
feature2.desc: Automatically capture leads from your public site, track their interest, and turn prospects into clients.

feature3.title: Bookings
feature3.desc: Complete booking system with calendar, automatic confirmations, and availability management.

feature4.title: Integrated Payments
feature4.desc: Accept payments with Stripe and MercadoPago. Generate automatic vouchers and keep up-to-date financial control.

feature5.title: Real-Time Analytics
feature5.desc: Dashboard with metrics on visits, bookings, income, and performance of each property.

feature6.title: Team & Permissions
feature6.desc: Invite your team with specific roles and permissions. Control who can view, edit, or manage.

allInOne.title: Stop using
allInOne.description: With Inmobo, you centralize all your real estate business information. You no longer need to jump between 10 different tools — everything is integrated and synchronized in real time.
